thread.title: Ryan Giggs and Gemma Atkinson 'enjoy dinner together' after high court battle revelation
thread.title_full: Ryan Giggs and Gemma Atkinson 'enjoy dinner together' after high court battle revelation

author: Alistair McGeorge
title: Ryan Giggs and Gemma Atkinson 'enjoy dinner together' after high court battle revelation
text:
Ryan Giggs and Gemma Atkinson 'enjoy dinner together' after high court battle revelation The former Manchester United star is in a court battle with ex Stacey Share Gemma Atkinson and Ryan Giggs (Photo: MEN/Barcroft)   
Ryan Giggs reportedly enjoyed a cosy dinner with Emmerdale actress Gemma Atkinson after the revelation of his High Court battle with estranged wife Stacey . 
The former Manchester United favourite is said to have treated the soap star to a meal at George's Dining Room and Bar in Manchester this week. 
According to The Sun, the retired footballer appeared in good spirits as there seemed to be a spark between the pair during their evening out. Ryan Giggs reportedly went for dinner with Gemma Atkinson (Photo: Birmingham Mail) It's said the actress dined with him this week (Photo: Getty Images Europe) 
An onlooker told the newspaper: "Gemma was wearing an elegant strappy top on with her hair put up and Ryan seemed very impressed. 
"He kept sneaking glances at her. He looked like he was enjoying himself, certainly not a man with the weight of the world on his shoulders. 
â€œThere was definitely a spark there. They gave each other their undivided attention, and kept leaning across the table to get closer." It's said the retired footballer appeared to be in great spirits (Photo: ITV) Gemma is known for her role in Emmerdale as Carly Hope (Photo: ITV) 
It follows reports in The Sun that Giggs was seen getting cosy with the Emmerdale beauty at the Sports Personality of the Year awards after party in Manchester in December. 
The newspaper also claimed that single Gemma is a Man U fan and has previously named the star as her favourite ever player. 
But a source close to Gemma told Mirror Celeb at the time that the pair were simply at the event with the same publicist and that nothing is going on between them. Like us on Facebook
